e)/xein moi tw=n te a)/llwn e(/neka kai\ o(/pws ka)moi/ ti e)/xoite
xrh=sqai: w(s e)gw\ tou\s e)kei/nw| prosh/kontas i)/son e)mautw=|
prosh/kein u(polamba/nw.

body.head: *panaqhnai+ko/s

p.#text:
no/mos e)sti\ toi=s *(/ellhsi palaio\s, oi)=mai de\ kai\ tw=n barba/rwn toi=s plei/stois, trofeu=si xa/rin e)kti/nein a(/pasan,
o(/sh dunath/. ou(/stinas d' a)\n trofe/as prote/rous u(mw=n a)/goi
tis, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, dokw=n ge dh/ pws ei)s *(/ellhnas
telei=n, ou) r(a/|dion eu(rei=n, w(/s ge/ moi fai/netai. ma/lista
me\n ga\r kai\ th=s nenomisme/nhs tauthsi\ trofh=s kai\ koinh=s
u(ma=s eu)qu\s a)\n eu(/roi tis e)pwnu/mous kai\ porista\s skopw=n
e)c a)rxh=s: w(/ste e)/cestin ei)pei=n i)di/a| me\n a)/llous a)/llois ei)=nai
trofe/as, ou(\s a)\n h( tu/xh kai\ o( sumpi/ptwn xro/nos e(ka/stois
paraskeua/sh|, koinou\s de\ a(pa/ntwn trofe/as u(ma=s ei)=nai kai\
mo/nous kai\ pro/ ge au)tw=n e)/ti tw=n trofe/wn, w(/sper ou(\s
pate/ras pate/rwn kalou=sin oi( poihtai/: di' a(\ kai\ mo/na

th\n eu)/noian h)/rkei para\ pa/ntwn u(mi=n ei)=nai kata\ fu/sin.
ou) mh\n a)ll' oi(= ble/pwn to\ di/kaion e)poiou/mhn kai\ peri\ h(=s
ei)=xon e)n nw=| trofh=s ei)pei=n, th=s w(s a)lhqw=s kaqara=s kai\
diafero/ntws a)nqrw/pou, th=s e)n maqh/masi kai\ lo/gois, ti/s
ou(/tws e)/cw tou/twn e)sti\n w(/st' a)gnoei=n par' u(mw=n ou)=san
a(/pasi th\n a)rxh/n; w(/ste ei)ko\s kai\ to\n peri\ tou/twn lo/gon 
deu=ro komi/zein kai\ tima=n toi=s gignome/nois th\n po/lin. w(s
ta\s me\n a)/llas xa/ritas dikai/as me\n, ou) mh\n tw=n pragma/twn a)/ntikrus ei)=nai sumbe/bhke, mo/nhn de\ tau/thn gnhsi/an
th=s eu)ergesi/as e)/cesti proseipei=n. h( ga\r u(pe\r lo/gwn lo/gw|
gignome/nh xa/ris ou) mo/non to\ di/kaion e)/xei meq' e(auth=s,
a)lla\ kai\ th\n a)po\ tou= lo/gou prw=ton e)pwnumi/an bebaioi=,
mo/nh ga/r e)stin a)kribw=s eu)/logos. mhdei\s de\ u(mw=n, w)= nu=n
te paro/ntes toi=s lo/gois kai\ xro/nw| suneso/menoi, mhdemi/an
prope/teian mhde\ eu)h/qeian katagnw=| tou= panto\s e)gxeirh/matos, ei) mh/te prosthsa/menoi sxh=ma faulo/teron tou= lo/gou mh/te a(\ polla\ kai\ e)rgw/dh tw=| lo/gw| pro/sesti dei/santes u(pe/sthmen e)k tou= fanerou= tosou=ton a)gw=na. ma/lista
me\n ga\r, ei) kai\ tou=to a)/cion ai)ti/as, ou)de\ ta\ pro\s tou\s
qeou\s h(mi=n ge parei=tai to\ mh\ ou) tetolmh=sqai. e)/peit'
ou)de/ me tou=to le/lhqen w(s e)rgw/dhs o( lo/gos kai\ xalepo\s
dienegkei=n kai\ ta\s e)kdroma\s o(po/sas e)/xei: a(\s kai\ sunidei=n
a(pa/sas kai\ diele/sqai kaq' e(ka/sthn kai\ plhrw=sai dia\
te/lous a)du/naton mh\ ou) su\n mega/lh| kai\ lampra=| th=| tu/xh|:
pro\s de\ tou/tois, e)f' o(/sois e)/qnesi toi=s peri\ au)tw=n ei)rhko/si kai\ prokateilhfo/si ta\s a)koa\s e)perxo/meqa, mei=zon
e)/xontes e)/rgon o(/ ti fulaco/meqa h)\ o(/tw| xrhso/meqa eu(rei=n.

a)/llwn ga\r a)/lla kekosmhko/twn kai\ diecelhluqo/twn ta\ pa=si
pareime/na pa=si kai\ peplh/rwtai: kai\ sumbai/nei diplou=n
to\n a)gw=na gi/gnesqai tw=| meta\ pa/ntas e)gxeirou=nti, kai\
xwri\s pro\s e(/kaston kai\ koinh=| pro\s a(/pantas.

ou) mh\n a)ll' au)to/ ge tou=t' e)sti\ to\ kai\ mo/non pepoihko/s moi to\n lo/gon, o(/ti ou(/tw polloi=s kai\ mega/lois
th=s po/lews u(perexou/shs, kai\ to/pon ou)de/na toi=s boulome/nois eu)fhmei=n a)rgo\n pareikui/as, ou)dei/s pw me/xri th=sde
th=s h(me/ras ei)s a(/panta kaqh=ken e(auto\n ou)d' e)qa/rrhsen.
a)ll' oi( me\n tou\s a)/nw xro/nous e)n toi=s poih/masin a)/|dousi
kai\ ta\ pro\s tou\s qeou\s koina\ th=| po/lei, kai\ tau=t' a)po\
tou= parei/kontos, oi( de\ tou\s e)pi\ tw=n kairw=n pole/mous pro\s
*(/ellhnas kai\ barba/rous a)fhgou=ntai memerisme/nws: e(/teroi
de\ th\n politei/an katale/gousin: oi( de\ e)n toi=s e)pitafi/ois
lo/gois tw=n a)poqano/ntwn e)ni/ous proseirh/kasin. ei)si\ de\ oi(\
ka)n tou/tois, ou)x w(s nomi/zetai, dia\ tw=n pra/cewn h)=lqon,
a)ll' e(te/ran e)tra/ponto, dei/santes, e)moi\ dokei=n, e)la/ttous
gene/sqai tw=n pragma/twn, ou)k e)/cw me/n pou suggnw/mhs
labo/ntes fo/bon, a)ll' ou)=n ou(/tw pollou= tinos e)de/hsan peri\
pa/ntwn ge tw=n u(parxo/ntwn th=| po/lei diecelqei=n. kai\ mh\n
oi( me\n th\n sofi/an au)th=s e)gkwmia/zousin, oi( de\ ta\s a)poiki/as katale/gousin, e(/teroi de\ au)= th\n koino/thta kai\ filanqrwpi/an u(mnou=si, kai\ tau=ta oi( me\n toi=s suggra/mmasi/
pou toi=s a)/llois e)gkatamignu/ntes, oi( d' a)po\ sto/matos
ou(twsi\ kata\ to\ sumbai=non th=s mnh/mhs. w(s de\ a(plw=s ei)pei=n,
a(/pantes h)\ tw=| boulh/mati tw=| sfete/rw| memetrh/kasin h)\ th=|
duna/mei ta\ pro\s th\n po/lin, ou) tw=| th=s po/lews me/trw| ou)de\
tw=| tw=n pragma/twn, a)lla\ w(/sper pela/gous a)pei/rou kai\

toi=s o)fqalmoi=s ou)x o(ri/zontos e(/kastos o(/son kaqora=|, 
tou=to qauma/zei: kai\ sumbe/bhken w(/sper ai)/nigma th=| po/lei:
h(=| ga\r tosou=ton eu)fhmiw=n kai\ do/chs peri/esti, tau/th|, ka)\n
w(s e)la/xiston tou/twn w(=n me/testin ei)/ph| tis, ou) tou= panto\s a(marth/setai. ou) dh\ di/kaion th\n mo/nhn tou= tolmh/matos ai)ti/an kai\ di' h(\n ei)ko/tws e)de/hse tou= nuni\ lo/gou, tau/thn e)kei/nhs a)ciw=sai th=s ai)ti/as, h(=| to\ th=s me/myew/s e)stin
o)/noma. e)/peita ei) me\n mh\ pollw=n kai\ kalw=n kai\ mega/lwn
o)/ntwn, ou) me\n ou)=n ou)/t' a)pariqmh=sai r(a|di/wn ou)/te metrh=sai dunatw=n tw=n ei)s tosou=ton th\n po/lin h)|rko/twn, e(/n
ti kai\ tou=to to\ tw=n lo/gwn h)=n a)gaqo\n, ou)k a)\n i)/sws
h(/rmotte parakinduneu/ein, a)ll' e)a=n o(/pws pot' ei)=xe ta\ th=s
do/chs au)th=|: nuni\ d' w(/sper tw=n a)/llwn a(pa/ntwn h(gemw\n
toi=s *(/ellhsin, oi)=mai de\ kai\ toi=s a)/llois a)nqrw/pois, gege/nhtai, ou(/tws o(/ti kai\ tw=n lo/gwn prw/th gnw/rimo/n e)stin: 
w(/ste ou)/t' a)llotri/a| th=| pei/ra| xrw/meqa, ou)d' e(te/rwse fe/rousan o(do\n proeilo/meqa, a)ll' a)kribw=s e)pi\ th\n po/lin
kai\ tou\s *)aqhnai/ous, ou)/te e)la/ttw ta\ th=s po/lews poiou=men, a)ll' e(/n ti tw=n th=s po/lews e)kti/nomen, ei)s o(/son e)gxwrei=. ei)rhme/non de\ u(po\ pollw=n polla/kis w(s a)/ra ou) r(a/|dion eu(rei=n o(/qen a)/rcetai/ tis, e)mo\n, ou)k a)/llou tou=ton to\n
lo/gon ei)=nai nomi/zw th=| xrei/a|. ou) ga\r mo/non tw=| presbuta/thn ei)=nai tw=n e)n mnh/mh| th\n po/lin sumbai/nei kai\ th\n a)rxh\n a)nh/kein ei)s to\ ple/on tou= fanerou= kai\ proxei/rou
labei=n, a)ll' o(/ti kai\ polla\s w(/sper e)n ku/klw| ta\s a)rxa\s o(
lo/gos prodei/knusin, a(\s ou)/te o(mou= poih/sasqai dh/ pou dunato\n ou)/q' h(/tis a)rxh\ tai=s a)/llais ei)=nai nikh/sei r(a/|dion
kri=nai: a)/lla ga\r a)/llwn e(/neka a(rmo/ttein w(/s g' e)k tou=
profainome/nou prw=ta lexqh=nai do/can pari/sthsin.

h(\n de\ a(pasw=n e)pikairota/thn a)rxh\n u(polamba/nw kai\
pro\s h(\n h(/kist' a)\n a(martei=n, a(/panta kaqista/menos to\n
lo/gon, tau/thn kai\ dh\ poih/somai: ei) d' o)rqw=s, h)\ mh\, pa/resti koinwnei=n th=s gnw/mhs. oi)=mai d', a)\n w(s u(pe\r oi)kei/as
kai\ mete/xwn tw=n a)gaqw=n e)/stin ou(= fai/nwmai tw=| lo/gw|
xrw/menos, ou)d' u(mi=n a)\n fe/rein ai)sxu/nhn. h( ga\r th=s xw/ras h(mi=n fu/sis th=| fu/sei tw=n a)ndrw=n sumbai/nousa fanh/setai kai\ ou)/q' h( gh= pre/pousa e(te/rwn ei)=nai, ou)/koun ou)de\
e)ge/neto, ou)/q' oi( a)/ndres a)/llhs a)nti\ tau/ths a)/cioi, ou)/koun
ou)de\ h)lla/canto, a)ll' e)/meinan e)f' h(=s ei)=xon: a)/mfw de\
tau=ta o)/yei kai\ mnh/mh| kri/netai. oi(/ te ga\r oi)kh/santes a)ei\ 
th\n xw/ran e)nargh= kai\ qaumasta\ th=s au(tw=n e)pieikei/as
shmei=a e)ch/negkan e)n panti\ tw=| parasxo/nti, ta\ me\n h(\n
ou(twsi/ tis a)\n ei)/poi filanqrwpi/an e)pideiknu/menoi th=| tw=n
tro/pwn prao/thti kai\ tai=s o(mili/ais, ou)de/sin a)/llois o(moi/ws
h(me/rois ei)=nai dokei=n lipo/ntes, ta\ d' e)n tai=s xrei/ais kai\
toi=s kindu/nois e)n probo/lou moi/ra| toi=s *(/ellhsi tetagme/noi.
kai\ to\ th=s xw/ras au)= sxh=ma toiou=ton e)k gh=s kai\
qala/tths qewrou=nti. pro/keitai ga\r a)nt' a)/llou fulakthri/ou
th=s *(ella/dos th\n gignome/nhn ta/cin e)/xousa prw/th pro\s
h(/lion a)ni/sxonta, promh/khs ei)s to\ pe/lagos, kai\ ma/la
e)nargh\s sumbalei=n o(/ti th=s *(ella/dos e)sti\n e)/ruma u(po\ tw=n
kreitto/nwn pepoihme/non kai\ mo/nh| tau/th| kata\ fu/sin e)/stin
h(gei=sqai tou= ge/nous. ei)=ta kai\ th=s filanqrwpi/as w(sperei\
su/mbolon e)kfe/rei: probai/nei ga\r me/xri plei/stou, th\n qa/lattan h(merou=sa, kai\ tai=s nh/sois e)gkatami/gnutai, qeama/twn h(/diston, h)/peiros e)n nh/sois, kai\ tou/twn e)ni/wn notiwte/ra, prw/th me\n toi=s e)k tou= pela/gous w(sperei\ xei=ra
protei/nousa ei)s u(podoxh\n, pantodapou\s de\ o(/rmous kai\ lime/nas parexome/nh ku/klw| peri\ pa=san e(auth\n, e)/ti de\
a)kta\s a)/llas kat' a)/lla me/rh th=s te qala/tths kai\ e(auth=s, kai\ porqmou\s pro\s ta\s e)pikeime/nas nh/sous ou)
ple/on dialei/pontas h)\ o(/son ai( nh=soi pro\s a)llh/las: w(/ste
kai\ paraplei=n kai\ periplei=n kai\ pezeu/ein kai\ e)/ti pelagi/ous ei)=nai dia\ th=s *)attikh=s w(/sper e)n pomph=| kat' e)cousi/an to\ pro\s h(donh\n ai(roume/nous. ai( de\ e)pi/keintai pantaxo/qen pepoikilme/nai *kukla/des kai\ *spora/des peri\ th\n
*)attikh\n, w(/sper th=s qala/tths e)cepi/thdes a)nei/shs a)nti\ 
proastei/wn th=| po/lei, xorou= sxh=ma sw/zousai, kai\ ta\
e)kei/nwn ka/llh kai\ ko/smous th=s po/lews ka/llh kai\ ko/smous
ei)=nai sumbe/bhke. du/nantai ga\r o(/per toi=s basilei/ois ta\
propu/laia, kai\ selh/nhn a)ste/res e)gklei/ousi, poihth\s a)\n
ei)/poi tis, mei=zon fe/rousai ke/rdos h)\ o(/son pare/xousi: le/gw
dh\ tou= prosoikei=n. di' a(\ dh\ kai\ mo/nh| th=| po/lei kuri/ws a)/n

*(ellhnikw=n, tou\s d' a)/llous no/qous ei)s th\n qa/lattan e)mbh=nai, w(/sper u(pobolimai/ous, ou) patrikai=s tai=s nh/sois
e)piqeme/nous, a)ll' a(rpa/santas tu/xhs a)logi/a|, o(/per au)tou\s
kai\ taxe/ws pa/lin e)ch/lase.

tou=to de\ to\ sxh=ma kai\ tau/thn th\n qe/sin th=s xw/ras
e)xou/shs, to\n me\n a)ei\ kata/ploun tw=n e)mpo/rwn te kai\ kaq'
i(stori/an h)\ xrei/an ei)safiknoume/nwn, meq' o(/shs th=s r(a|stw/nhs kai\ yuxagwgi/as gi/gnetai kai\ trufh=s ou) r(a/|dion
ei)pei=n, plh\n ei)s o(/son au)tou/s tis e)pimartu/raito: ou(/tw ga\r
panta/pasin h( yuxh\ prokaqai/retai kai\ mete/wros kai\
kou/fh gi/gnetai kai\ sfo/dra tw=n *)aqhnw=n th=s qe/as e)n
paraskeuh=|, w(/sper e)n i(eroi=s proteloume/nh. e)pi/dhlon de\
kai\ toi=s o)fqalmoi=s ple/on tou= sunh/qous to\ fw=s e)ggigno/menon, a)fairou/shs h)/dh th\n pollh\n a)xlu\n w(s a)lhqw=s kai\
kaq' *(/omhron ei)pei=n th=s *)aqhna=s e)/ti th=| xw/ra|
prosago/ntwn. w(/ste e)/oiken o)nei/ratos eu)frosu/nh| ta\ qea/mata kai\
xorei/an e)celi/ttein, ou) plou=n a)nu/tein do/cais a)\n, oi(=a th\n
nau=n a)ei\ ku/klw| perii/statai ka/llh pantodapa\ a)/gonta
met' eu)qumi/as e)pi\ th\n *)attikh/n. toi=s d' o(rwme/nois sumbai/nei kai\ ta\ lego/mena, oi(=s ou)k e)/nestin a)pistei=n: pa/nta
ga\r e(ch=s o(moi/ws e)/xei. *lhtw/ te ga\r, ei) kai\ mikro\n u(/steron a(rmo/sei peri\ tw=n qei/wn dihgei=sqai, lusame/nh th\n
zw/nhn e)n *zwsth=ri th=s *)attikh=s kai\ lipou=sa th\n e)pwnumi/an tw=| to/pw|, badi/zousa a)ei\ ei)s to\ pro\s e(/w th=s *pronoi/as *)aqhna=s h(goume/nhs, a)p' a)/kras th=s *)attikh=s e)piba=sa
tw=n nh/swn ei)s *dh=lon katai/rei kai\ ti/ktei dh\ tou\s qeou\s

th/n te *)/artemin kai\ to\n patrw=|on *)apo/llw th=| po/lei, h(/ t'
a)po\ th=s *)asi/as e)pi\ tou\s *(/ellhnas prw/th diaba=sa
du/namis dia\ tw=n nh/swn prose/sxen ei)s *maraqw=na, kalw=s u(po\
th=s fu/sews a)xqei=sa tou= to/pou pro\s to\ dou=nai di/khn w(=n
e)pebou/leuse toi=s *(/ellhsin. ou(/tw d' e)n a)rxh=| th=s *(ella/dos
ou)=sa h( xw/ra e)n me/sw| th=s pa/shs ou)x h(=tto/n e)stin. o(/poi
ga\r a)p' au)th=s kinhqei/hs, ta\ gnwrimw/tata tw=n *(ellh/nwn
e)kde/xetai ge/nh, kai\ w(/sper po/lin h( oi)kei/a xw/ra prosoikei=,
ou(/tw kai\ th\n *)attikh\n a(/pasa h( *(ella\s prosoikei=. dio\ dh\
kai\ mo/nh to\ tw=n *(ellh/nwn pro/sxhma kaqarw=s a)nh/|rhtai
kai\ toi=s barba/rois e)sti\n e)pi\ plei=ston a)llo/fulos: o(/son
ga\r th=| fu/sei tou= to/pou kexw/ristai, tosou=ton kai\ toi=s
h)/qesi tw=n a)ndrw=n a)fe/sthken. ou)/te ga\r potamou= me/sou
koinwnei= tinos ou)/t' e)sti\n au)th=| meqo/rion ou)de\n to\ au)to\
diairou=n kai\ mignu/on th\n gh=n, a)ll' w(/sper pro\s a)spi/dos
e)pi/shmon pa/nta pro\s me/son tou=to to\ xwri/on e)k panto\s
a)/krou tei/nei ta\ *(ellhnika\, kai\ pantaxo/qen ku/kloi perie/xousi th\n xw/ran *(ellhnikoi\, oi( me\n e)k qala/tths, oi( d'
a)po\ th=s h)pei/rou perikei/menoi, w(/sper ei)ko\s th=| koinh=| tou=
ge/nous e(sti/a|. tosou=ton de\ pe/feuge th\n a)llodaph\n kai\
ba/rbaron w(/ste kai\ e)pi\ th=s a)ntipe/ran h)pei/rou prou)ba/lleto e(te/ran *(ella/da a)/poikon e(auth=s, h(\ nu=n h)/dh plei=ston
barba/rwn a)fe/sthken, w(/sper fu/sei taxqei=sa h( po/lis, a)nti/palos tou/tw| tw=| ge/nei kai\ polemi/a. e)c w(=n a)/dolon me\n
kai\ kaqaro\n kai\ a)dia/fqoron to\ h)=qos a)ei\ toi=s e)c au)th=s
diage/gone parexome/nh, ei)likrinh= de\ kai\ kaqara\n kai\
a)/lupon kai\ para/deigma pa/shs th=s *(ellhnikh=s o(mili/as fwnh\n

ei)shne/gkato. h( d' au)th\ qe/sis th=s te xw/ras e)n th=| *(ella/di
kai\ th=s po/lews e)n th=| xw/ra|, me/sh ga\r e)n me/sh| kei=tai,
tosou=ton pro\s qa/lattan e)pikli/nousa, o(/son tou\s lime/nas
h(=s ei)si fai/nesqai. tri/th de\ a)ko/louqos tou/twn a)ne/xei,
perifanh\s a)/nw dia\ me/shs th=s po/lews, h( pa/lai me\n po/lis,
nu=n de\ a)kro/polis, korufh=| paraplhsi/ws, ou)x w(s u(/staton
ei)=nai th=s po/lews, a)ll' w(s peri\ au)th\n pa=n to\ loipo\n
sw=ma th=s po/lews, a)/krou kai\ me/sou tautou= sumpeptwko/tos, to\ dia\ pa/ntwn h)/dh tou=to ka/llos kai\ o( teleutai=os
o(/ros th=s peri\ gh=n eu)kairi/as. w(/sper ga\r e)p' a)spi/dos
ku/klwn ei)s a)llh/lous e)mbebhko/twn pe/mptos ei)s o)mfalo\n
plhroi= dia\ pa/ntwn o( ka/llistos, ei)/per h( me\n *(ella\s e)n
me/sw| th=s pa/shs gh=s, h( d' *)attikh\ th=s *(ella/dos, th=s de\
xw/ras h( po/lis, th=s d' au)= po/lews h( o(mw/numos. a)ll' e)ntau=qa me\n h(ma=s o( lo/gos parh/negke th=s a)ei\ parapiptou/shs a)kolouqi/as e)xo/menos. e)pistrepte/on de\ pa/lin pro\s th\n
xw/ran kai\ ta\ presbei=a fulakte/on au)th=|, h(=s th\n me\n pro\s
gh=s te kai\ qala/tths fu/sin ei)/pomen di' o(/swn ei)ko\s h)=n,
